About this Manual

This is the Missing Course Manual for COMP604 - Operating Systems. It covers:

  • Software setup
  • The structure of xv6
  • Neccesary C concepts for this class
  • System call setup
  • My general approach to the assignments

This is a living document, and will be updated frequently. Additionally, this is not an official document. There almost certainly are errors, and if you find any please contact me to have the document updated.
